SELECT i.item_name itemName,i.id itemId,i.sell_counts sellCounts,ig.url imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ig ON i.id = ig.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ig.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
